website_summaries.verdict: On the strong side in terms of its ability to cut through food that's on the firmer side.
pros: Ideal for cutting meat and loved by those who are perfecting their at-home chef skills
Some customers note it can even cut through frozen meals
We love the price tag as much as its ability to perform
cons: Some note the blade could be sharper, but overall reviews suggest this knife will get the intended job done

customer_reviews.title: A revelation
customer_reviews.text: Over the past 55 years of making Chinese food, I've always owned whatever sort of cleaver I could find on the shelf of a shop in Chinatown. This Shibazizuo knife is in the same class as high-end chef's knives from the best and most expensive European manufacturers. It's wonderfully thin and allows slicing finer than I've ever achieved without using a mandoline. I think I'll take the trouble to learn how to apply the final honing which will preserve its factory edge. One of the best knives I have ever owned, but far from the most expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ramos Washington

customer_reviews.title: Without non-sticking coating. Annoying but sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and the handle is ergonormic and friendly to women's hands. But the blade is incomparably sticking! Chopping potatos and taro feel as easy as cutting tofu while getting them off the blade is annoying. The vegetables seem like adhesive to the blade like fouling organisms. Even my plastic cutting board is a bit adhesive to the knife that lifting the knife from the board is laboursome. At first I wanted to return it, but I decided to give it a try for it's sharpness. Now I'm pretty used to it. Definitely a nice knife, especially for chopping, dicing, shredding and cutting small bone.
customer_reviews.author: Liang Ye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect :)
customer_reviews.text: My husband watches some eccentric cook on YouTube that swears by using a Chinese cleaver to chop his veggies. Naturally my husband became obsessed with having one. I bought him this. He loves it! It is great for a first time cleaver user. Arrived quickly and was packaged beautifully (if you're going to be gifting it). Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for mom and she definitely loves it. To me, Chinese chef-knife is easier to use as its larger surface allows you to easily scoop up the chopped food and it's also more "finger-friendly" (if you know how to properly hold the food with your other hand). I've been using Chinese chef-knife for more than 12 years and never ever cut myself. Plus it's lighter than it looks like, worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Zhenyu Lei

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and balanced
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice sharp, balanced, perfect length, all purpose knife. Best part is that you can use it like a spatula to scoop up the food. The thickness is about the thickness of a nickel. It wont flex on you while you're chopping and slicing.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie

customer_reviews.title: Thin blade but VERY sharp
customer_reviews.text: this is a great buy. I had one that I purchased in Shanghai 15 years ago and the handle broke and I could not find anywhere to repair it, so I had to replace it, This cleaver is somewhat lighter in weight but holds an edge very well and does everything you could need, except I think a bit more heft would be better if you were chopping meat bones frequently
customer_reviews.author: john mogab

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-known brand in China. I bought this to replace my old one. Very sharp and easy to use.highly recommend to you.
customer_reviews.author: ping wang

customer_reviews.title: light weight and sharp
customer_reviews.text: nice for a lady to use, it's light and comparatively smaller comparing with the traditional Chinese chef knife. Easy to grip and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia26yang

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife, but was delivered bent and out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I took a while looking into knives and I really wanted a vegetable cleaver. I looked into this one and knew that SHIBAZI knives were pretty okay. The price was pretty decent so I pulled the trigger and was super stoked to get it. Unfortunately when it arrived, it was delivered with lotions and shampoos, and the knive was out of it's own packaging just floating around in the box. And on further inspection, the knife is DENTED at the tip. With that said, basic chopping is fine. Wielding the knife is nice so far, but it's hard to chop anything tip first like a cabbage or lettuce head. I'm bummed with how it came.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This knife is a bit lighter in weight than expected, and a bit smaller than other similar knives, but it performs flawlessly and I couldn’t be happier. It is the sharpest knife I’ve ever used, even compared to my high end knives, and the rosewood handle is lovely and is a perfect fit for my hand. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Clean Veganista

customer_reviews.title: The weight in the handle is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I have been looking for. The weight in the handle is perfect for me, I have small hands and am somewhat arthritic.
customer_reviews.author: Maryfrances Gillen

customer_reviews.title: You’re getting a more expensive quality of knife for a value price
customer_reviews.text: It cut through a raw potato like it was butter and I was able to slice chips thinner than I ever have ...I use it for all my veggies and boneless meats ..it’s full tang and well built , the handles are comfortable for long time use.....it came razor sharp out of the box and I’ve only had to strop it once or twice for it to cut through phone book paper....my wife says it’s scary sharp so I had to make a sheath for it.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy s weeks

customer_reviews.title: An Incredible Chopper
customer_reviews.text: I just received the cleaver yesterday and started chopping a variety of veggies for a Chinese meal. Wow I couldn’t believe how sharp and easy it was to chop with this cleaver. For the modest price this product can’t be beat. I wish the manufacturer would provide a removable blade guard to protect the cutting edge during storage.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelle M. Swope

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great knife! Very sharp. Still perfecting my skill with it, but I really like the knife.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie O.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaver for the price. Needed it to cut through chicken or turkey neck and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap material and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I purchased this knife to brake bones or meat, When I got the knife It was a very lighted weight and cheap-looking knife, It couldn't brake boon or meat, these type tools must have some weight in order to break bones or meat, I DIDN'T LIKE IT AND RETURNED IT, DO NOT BUY. THANKS BUT NO THANKS. LOL, LOL
customer_reviews.author: GHULAM SARAJZADA

customer_reviews.title: VERY sharp
customer_reviews.text: This vegetable knife is very sharp when I first got it, but the steel isn't very hard. HOWEVER, it was easy enough to use a knife steel to hone the blade. The shape and size make it PERFECT to chop small cuts of meat or veggies with, and the blade shape is excellent. A real deal at the price, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Gross

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and thin blade.  Mini Knife
customer_reviews.text: My 10 years knife was not working great for us and I thought it was a good idea to get a replacement. But boy, this Chinese Knife is so tiny and I think this is not for any adult. First of all, it is so thin and light in weight. They called it 'Strong&Thick Blade', this is totally misleading. The handle is covered with decent wood and handy. But I just can't take the tiny knife at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.RandomGuy

customer_reviews.title: Knife me away
customer_reviews.text: It’s not so heavy and quite easy to hold. Sharp blade so make sure you’re careful. I’d recommend using with a glove if you want to make sure it’s clean.
customer_reviews.author: T L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knife
customer_reviews.text: I really like this knife, it came wicked sharp and it's pretty durable. Upkeep is super easy, this has been my favorite knife to use in the kitchen and I much prefer this knife than most of my more expensive knife.
customer_reviews.author: Keang Chong

customer_reviews.title: Great knife, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am Culinary school trained with over 10 years restaurant experience on the East Coast. I have used all different kinds of knives at work and now when cooking at home. I can honestly say that I absolutely love this cleaver. It fits really well in your hand and it is nicely sharp. The price and quality is great and I would definitely buy again. I will be buying another knife from this company!
customer_reviews.author: frontsoldatmm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shape and size of this sharp knife is ideal for cutting all kinds of vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit pricey compared to some other knives, but I like its smaller size as opposed to other large Chinese knives. It is also pretty sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Sharp but sticky
customer_reviews.text: This knife is sharp and has a good weight balance. The only downsides are that it can be sticky and the wood handle does not fully cover the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife, but a little small
customer_reviews.text: Used to have a little bigger one, the cut is sharp, it has a good quality. The package is a little ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Sfhehe

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchaser
customer_reviews.text: Great knife for its price! This is our second one we bought as back up. The first one we bought a year ago still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Best knife I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I regretted of not buying it long time ago. Best knife I have ever used! Cutting meats and vegetables becomes so easy for me. Light weight and the grip is comfortable. The package looks soso, which is good since it brings down the price. quality is amazing!!! I will buy another one for my parents.
customer_reviews.author: Xp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present for my brother in law who likes to cook. He loved it! The wood on the handle is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Robinson Sterling

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell how happy I am when I use it. My cooking becomes much more enjoin. Cutting, cutting very easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: haiyan jiang

customer_reviews.title: I don’t use other knifes in my house anymore
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I got this knife, I’ve been enjoying cutting and cooking so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for the dollar
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for the dollar. this is a mid weight meat cleaver. It is good for boning out poultry, separate it at the joints and cutting chopping meat. You can use it as a CCK, but that's not what it's designed for. Relative mild ductile steel that won't chip like harder steels, but still keeps a good edge.Comfortable handle. I WOULD buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: HR Hamada

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, took 3 weeks to get the product from China.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle 客户

customer_reviews.title: makes thin slices easily
customer_reviews.text: I sliced vegetables easily. None of my other knives will do what this one does so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: There is a big gap with the imagination
customer_reviews.text: The product is not as good as I thought. The handle is not very easy to control, probably because my hands are small. In general, the feeling of use is very general, just make do with it.
customer_reviews.author: honey B

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time having Chinese style knife. I am not a chef, just a regular Hime cooker, and I'm happy with this knife. So much better than over priced shopping mall knives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: For the money it’s s good buy. It’s cheap but sharp. Handle is a bit hard but acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: JandR

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in outcome
customer_reviews.text: The handle is amazing and makes for a great firm grip. Sadly the blade itself is very weak. I even took the advice of people in the comments and sharpened the product. It’s weak and breaks after the 1st use. Unless you’re cutting cucumbers (which would be the wrong use) I would stay away from this.
customer_reviews.author: Pauly C

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected - very sharp
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new cleaver style kitchen knife and wanted to find one at a good price. This knife was as good as some of the better known names for a lower cost. It also arrived without any need to sharpen -- it's very sharp and feels well made.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this just wish it was a little bit bigger.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s good, but for me I think this knife is light for me.

customer_reviews.title: A great knife
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and ready to use after open. Have used for a few weeks and this is the only knife I use every day now.

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting! Roach inside the package!
customer_reviews.text: It is really disgusting! A roach is inside the package and the knife is not packaged in close! Don’t buy it!

customer_reviews.title: Nicey nicey dicey dicey
customer_reviews.text: Blade quality is great very sharp out of the box USE CATION!!! Definitely get one handle is good as well make sure you seal it with cooking oil

customer_reviews.text: It’s quality can compete with those $100s fancy knifes. Far exceed my expectation .

customer_reviews.text: Not sharp at all, and the handle not comfort to grab.

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife!
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands and am able to use this knife easily. It cuts everything easily; including tomatoes.

customer_reviews.title: Light knife
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and really light, my wife likes it.

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp!
customer_reviews.text: It's a handy and sharp knife. So far happy with it. Hope it can last.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a poorly made knife with sharp edge next to the handle where your index finger will contact. The handle is not smoothly integrated with the steel part with slightly raised sharp steel edges.

customer_reviews.title: Best Chinese Kinfe in US so far
customer_reviews.text: Best Chinese Kinfe in US I have found yet. the size could be a little bigger
customer_reviews.author: Alex W

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Well balanced and light. Easy to hold. Chops very well

customer_reviews.title: Suit for slicing and light cutting
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice and famous Chinese knife. It's really sharp and does good work on slicing and lighting e.g. vegetables, but it's also really light and not suit for heavier work like chopping or smashing a garlic.
customer_reviews.author: liyou

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a good knife, it doesn't bend and it maintains it's edge very well. It is also very thin

customer_reviews.text: the knife is very sharp. The handle is very comfortable to hold.

customer_reviews.title: sharp and easy to use, get rusted quickly
customer_reviews.text: The knife is very sharp and easy to use. However, the blade starts to get rusted just after one month. Not sure if this item is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Wang

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp knife! Exactly what I was expecting. Perfect for thin cuts.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice knife
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying to cook some traditional Chinese foods, you should have a knife like this one. It is really easy for use and easy for maintain.

customer_reviews.title: Light and sharp. Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: he bottles glass quality is good, not cheap and thin. Better than I expected for the price, I will buy these again.

customer_reviews.text: I am no knife or material expert. But the quality of the knife just does not justify the price.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. It’s razor sharp. Fits great in my hand. The only dislike is that they put stickers on the blade and they are hell to scrape off.

customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this knife, look at my fingers,it's too sharp.

customer_reviews.text: It's a great vegetable knife. Pretty flimsy. But it looks good.

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Knife feels good in the hand and it's scary sharp.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife, Excessive packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Had to use rubbing alcohol to remove all the sticker residue but after that was left with a pretty nice knife!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Beautiful Handles Came Razor Sharp Full Tang Cons: First one had a scratch and I had to return and buy another Comes with 3 difficult to remove stickers on the blade Customer Services called me within 24 hours of my review and offered a discount on a knife without stickers. I greatly appreciate the effort but it is not worth it to me to send it back again for some adhesive residue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really good asian style kitchen knife!!useful for cut chicken bones!
customer_reviews.author: maymay

customer_reviews.title: This is a Very Very sharp knife
customer_reviews.text: Becareful when u use it!!!I have a fear of it now!
customer_reviews.author: zhao

customer_reviews.title: This knife is a great weight. It came with a reasonably sharp blade
customer_reviews.text: This knife is a great weight. It came with a reasonably sharp blade. Shipping and handling was carried out in a professional manner. If you’re thinking about purchasing this item don’t hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stell

customer_reviews.title: Great Chinese Knife
customer_reviews.text: I grew up in China and always saw my grandpa use this kind of knife to literally cut anything except for bones. The motion of using this knife is different than the chef knife (made of Germany stainless steel which is a thicker material). You always use the knife in a up and down motion. I would say this knife is truly sharp and easy to use. For the price, it is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: A delightful kitchen knife
customer_reviews.text: It came very quickly, with free shipping too. The knife itself is light and sharp, and is a delightful tool in the kitchen. I no longer dread about slicing carrots, it is now such an easy and quick thing to do. We have been using it for over a week, and it is still sharp as new without any maintenance
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Sharp only when new
customer_reviews.text: It was super sharp when brand new. But after only a couple of weeks of usage, it became dull. I will have to sharpen it every other week to keep it sharp. It was not much better than my 20 year old cheap one in that sense.
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Hu

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I hope these knives hold their edge: they are wonderfully sharp when they arrive. Well-balanced and a pleasure to use—I have ordered four of them for myself and family.
customer_reviews.author: thomas e. kane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome SHARP KNIFE
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal, sweet sharp knife that will cut through frozen chicken breast! I know because I just finished making lunch an hour ago using it. Out of the freezer and on to the cutting board for a quick stir fry!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bittan

customer_reviews.title: Solid knife
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Good steel. Only issue is with my hand, the handle is a little short. Update: I bought two more of these. Very well balanced. Perfect for daily food preparation.
customer_reviews.author: michael bozuk

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Knife, Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It is sharp, it is well made, it is fantastic. I think the company heard the complain, the one I received did not have the annoying unremovable sticker.
customer_reviews.author: Red Astray

customer_reviews.title: Great for slice foods
customer_reviews.text: Finally found one I like from various factors: easy to hold, sharp to cut, and not so expensive as my Zwilling J.A. Henckels. Good buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Great clever style knife
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little practice and technique, but great knife that holds its edge. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lark

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this cleaver. I recently took up the hobby of Chinese stir frying and I use it exclusively for cutting thin slices of meat. A beautiful instrument and cuts like a razor. You will not be disappointed with this purchase. Good quality product well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Donald B. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Great knife, very sharp and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Best knife for the price point, suitable for most kinds of cooking, very sharp, handle feels well.

customer_reviews.text: I love this knife.its comfortable,well balanced, and arrives super sharp. For the price I don't think it can be beat.

customer_reviews.text: I like this knife. Not too expensive, but good quality. Easy to cut any vegetables.

customer_reviews.title: sharp and good size , but the blade is weak
customer_reviews.text: The knife is sharp and light, good for me to handle it. But the blade is weak ,easy to break if you cut something hard.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

product_meta.title: Chinese Knife SHI BA ZI ZUO Vegetable Meat Knife 6.7-inch Stainless Steel Slicer Cleaver, Wooden Handle with Moderate Weight
feature_bullets: Shibazizuo S2308-B heavy duty Chinese chef knife/cleaver for chopping, mincing, slicing at home, restaurant.
Biomechanical rosewood handle with exquisite finish is anti-slip and more comfortable to grip.
Making steel on our own to guarantee each knife is high quality and standard from the raw material.
Multifunctional wide blade can flap garlics and deliver food to pans.
Laser shiny surface prevents meat from sticking on the blade.

specifications.Manufacturer: YANGJIANG SHIBAZI KNIVES AND SCISSORS PRODUCTIONS CO., LTD
